articles.author: Anita Ramesh
articles.title: Open-source satellites promise hourly wildfire alerts
articles.description: A climate startup just flew its third open-source imaging satellite, opening the door to faster wildfire detection feeds for local newsrooms.

articles.author: Reuters staff
articles.title: Semiconductor alliance expands foundry capacity
articles.description: Three major chipmakers agreed to pool $4B into a shared foundry that will focus on automotive grade silicon.

articles.author: AP
articles.title: Arctic research vessel documents record low sea ice
articles.description: Field scientists reported unusually thin ice shelves and shared sonar maps that will be released under a Creative Commons license.

articles.author: Lydia Chen
articles.title: Battery recyclers race to capture sodium-ion boom
articles.description: New regional plants are scaling to handle sodium-ion packs for grid storage, closing the loop on rare material reuse.

articles.author: Jon Porter
articles.title: Spatial audio finds a home on commuter trains
articles.description: Transit agencies are piloting subtle ambient alerts that blend with station announcements instead of blasting over speakers.

articles.author: Igor Bonifacic
articles.title: Indie devs embrace low-power game jams
articles.description: A 72 hour jam challenged teams to produce games that never push hardware past 25 percent CPU utilization.

articles.author: ESPN News Services
articles.title: Analytics board approves shot clock tweaks
articles.description: Professional basketball is experimenting with a 4 second reset after offensive rebounds during the winter showcase.

articles.author: Dr. Priya Patel
articles.title: Community clinics test AI scribes across five states
articles.description: Nurses say the lightweight tool cuts charting time in half, giving them space to hold longer follow-up conversations.
